name: Clear World
description: During each of your End Phases, pay 500 Life Points or destroy this card. Each player receives certain effects, depending on the monster Attributes they control. â— LIGHT: Play with your hand revealed at all times. â— DARK: If you control 2 or more monsters, you cannot declare an attack. â— EARTH: During your Standby Phase: Target 1 face-up Defense Position monster you control; destroy it. â— WATER: During your End Phase: Discard 1 card. â— FIRE: During your End Phase: Take 1000 damage. â— WIND: You must pay 500 Life Points to activate a Spell Card.
